ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] HCC settings?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Jigar, My hcc.properties only has a single line that s not a comment: org.archive.hcc.ClusterControlleBean.maxPerContainer=3 In my experience the real work
